name: A World Preserved by What Is Eternal
name_original: A World Preserved by What Is Eternal
description:
The Player will overload the central unit and 'World' will be transferred. 

A World Preserved by What Is Eternal is a metroidvania made for the GoGodot 2 Jam with the theme "Energy Source".

This Game is a prequel to my current big game dev project "A World Abandoned". You can find a link in the main menu if you are curious. 

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement

Space: Jump

D: Switch state of on-off-blocks

F: Pogo on spikes

Up and Down at the same time: exhaust energy faster

Gamepad Controls:

Left Stick: Movement

A: Jump

L2 or R2: Switch state of on-off-blocks

X: Pogo on spikes

L3 and R3 at the same time: exhaust energy faster
